new_skill_specs.name: extract_angle_measure_from_diagram
new_skill_specs.purpose: Extract the measure of a specified angle from a geometric diagram.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The measure of the specified angle as a float.
edge_cases: The angle label is not visible in the diagram.
Multiple angles are labeled with the same identifier.

new_skill_specs.name: map_measure_to_option
new_skill_specs.purpose: Map a given angle measure to the corresponding multiple-choice option.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The label of the option that matches the measure.
edge_cases: The measure does not match any of the options.
Multiple options have the same measure.
